channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How To Apply FinOps Principles To Platform Engineering
item.description: Many platform engineering teams grapple with breaking the cycle of escalating costs and inefficient manual cost management.

item.title: Can Russia’s Shaheds Win The Long-Range Drone War Against Ukraine?
item.description: Reports claim that Russia is ramping up production of Shahed long range attack drones. But the drone war is a matter of technology as well as numbers.
